title: N-Dimension Ranked Amongst Top Managed Security Service Providers Worldwide for Fourth Consecutive Year
text:
RICHMOND HILL, Ontario — N-Dimension Solutions, a market leading Managed Detection and Remediation Services (MDR) provider with innovative solutions protecting IIoT, IoT, IT and OT networks from cyber threats in Next-Gen MSSP and other applications, is pleased to have been recognized in MSSP Alert’s worldwide annual ranking of Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) for the fourth consecutive year. Once again, N-Dimension was ranked among the top cybersecurity companies worldwide, and one of the top companies in the world.

“We are pleased to have been once again recognized for our positive impact and leadership position in helping customers reduce cyber threats and their cyber threat risk surface,” said Mark Munday, Interim CEO, N-Dimension Solutions.

MSSP Alert is an IT media site focused on news related to cybersecurity-centric managed service providers MSPs. The methodology used by for the ranking is an aggregate of data from five industry leading sources:

– MSSP Alert worldwide survey of MSSPs (75% weighting)

– Gartner Magic Quadrant MSSPs (10% weighting)

– Cybersecurity 500: MSSP Category (5% weighting)

– IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Managed Security Services (5% weighting)

– Nelson Hall Managed Security Services Report (5% weighting)

N-Dimension offers the N-Sentinel Suite, a portfolio of managed security services that delivers continuous vulnerability assessment, detection, alerts and remediation steps for cyber threats. N-Sentinel Suite combines cloud-based security intelligence and cybersecurity experts to deliver actionable guidance that enables businesses to take timely, preemptive action to protect themselves against cyber threats and vulnerabilities.

To find out why N-Dimension is ranked high consistently by MSSP alert and why customers continue to choose and stay with N-Dimension, visit our website at www.n-dimension.com and request information for a free 60-day trial.

About N-Dimension Solutions

N-Dimension is a market leading Managed Detection and Remediation Services (MDR) provider with innovative solutions tailored to protect IoT, IIoT, IT and OT networks from cyberattacks, improving system reliability and safeguarding critical infrastructure, data and assets. Company headquarters are in Richmond Hill, Ontario, Canada and U.S. headquarters are located in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida. N-Dimension is a cybersecurity partner of Hometown Connections; an associate member of the American Public Power Association; National Rural Electric Cooperative Association (NRECA); Electricity Distributors Association (EDA); Excellence in Manufacturing Consortium (EMC) and works with the US Department of Energy.

For more information about N-Sentinel visit our website at www.n-dimension.com. Please follow us on Twitter and LinkedIn.
